scripts.build:ui: cd ui && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.verify:schwab: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); require('./dist/trader').verifySchwabConnection(1).then(r => { if (r.ok) { console.log('Schwab API: OK', r.positionsCount !== undefined ? '(' + r.positionsCount + ' positions)' : ''); } else { console.error('Schwab API: FAILED -', r.message); process.exit(1); } }).catch(e => { console.error('Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); })"
